summary: REQ-3 appears implemented by placing the top-level "About Us" navigation item immediately after "Industries We Serve" and before "Contact Us" in the shared navigation config. However, the diff content shows additional navigation content/utility code that is not requested by the BuildRequest, which may violate the "only reorder items" constraint.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/retained a "Custom Domain" navigation entry under the "About Us" dropdown ("/custom-domain"), which is not part of the requested reorder and could violate the "only reorder items; labels/paths/children unchanged" constraint.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest REQ-3 and constraints specify only reordering existing navigation items with no changes to labels/paths/children. The diff shows a specific additional child link under About Us that is unrelated to reordering.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/retained a helper function `getAllRoutes` that recursively extracts routes from the navigation config, which is not requested by REQ-3.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 only asks to reorder navigation items; introducing utility functions is outside scope unless it already existed. The diff summary provides no evidence this function existed previously.
